title: FND Users & Responsibilities / FND Kullan覺c覺lar ve Sorumluluklar
description: Lists active EBS users and their assigned responsibilities

queries.sql: SELECT fu.user_id, fu.user_name, fu.description, COUNT(DISTINCT fru.responsibility_id) resp_count, MAX(fu.last_logon_date) last_login FROM fnd_user fu LEFT JOIN fnd_user_resp_groups_direct fru ON fu.user_id = fru.user_id WHERE fu.end_date IS NULL GROUP BY fu.user_id, fu.user_name, fu.description ORDER BY fu.user_name FETCH FIRST 100 ROWS ONLY

doc_hint: Lists active EBS users and number of responsibilities assigned. High-responsibility accounts may be overprivileged.
analysis_prompt: Review active users. Identify: (1) users with many responsibilities, (2) users not logging in recently, (3) critical system user counts, (4) recommend access review.
